refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.simpara: ansible-doc displays information on modules installed in Ansible libraries. It displays a terse listing of modules and their short descriptions, provides a printout of their DOCUMENTATION strings, and it can create a short "snippet" which can be pasted into a playbook.

listitem.simpara: Add an additional directory to the default path for finding module libraries.
Produce a snippet which can be copied into a playbook for modification, like a kind of task template.
Produce a terse listing of modules and a short description of each.
